description:
iWant – Home of Filipino Feels
 
iWant is the premier streaming app for all Filipinos and Filipinas—whether you’re in the Philippines or anywhere in the world. Enjoy the biggest collection of Tagalog movies, Pinoy teleseryes, original series, and live TV channels, all in one easy-to-use platform.
 
What You Can Watch:
• 1,000+ titles including classic and current Filipino movies, teleseryes, and full series
• Exclusive iWant Originals – fresh, original content made for Filipinos
• Live TV and GMA shows – Access live channels and top-rated programs (availability varies by country and plan)
 
Stream Across All Devices
• Mobile, tablet, web, and Smart TVs – Seamless experience on Mobile phones and official TV apps
• Native TV App Support – Available on Apple TV, Fire TV, Roku, LG Smart TV, Samsung Smart TV, and more
• Subtitles in English and other languages – On select titles to reach global viewers
• Quick start – Launch the app and start watching instantly
• Smooth playback – High-quality streaming with minimal buffering
 
Made for Filipinos Everywhere
Whether you’re watching from Metro Manila, Cebu, Davao, or overseas in the U.S., Canada, Middle East, Europe, or Asia-Pacific, iWant brings Filipino stories, culture, and entertainment straight to your screen.
 
Why Choose iWant:
• Most comprehensive Filipino content platform
• Regularly updated with new episodes and trending titles
• Trusted by millions of Filipinos worldwide
• Compatible with all major Mobile and Smart TV devices
• Ad-free viewing with subscription – safe, secure, and legal
 
Some content and features may require a subscription. Availability varies by country.
 
Terms of Use: https://www.iwanttfc.com/terms-and-conditions
Privacy Policy: https://www.iwanttfc.com/privacy-policy
 
Have questions or feedback? Email us at support@iwanttfc.com or visit the Help Center.

Compatibility requires iOS 15.0 or later.
Compatible with iPhone and iPad.

Watch movies, TV shows, live programming, and sports including Amazon MGM Studios-produced series and movies Road House, The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power, Fallout, Reacher, The Boys, and The Idea of You, and much more. Browse titles, search for your favorites, or enjoy movies and shows recommended just for you.

App features:
• Download videos to watch anywhere.
• Rent or buy new-release movies and popular TV shows (availability varies by marketplace).
• Cast from your phone or tablet to the big screen with Chromecast.
• Create multiple profiles so each person gets a personalized entertainment experience.
• Go behind the scenes of movies and TV shows with exclusive X-Ray access, powered by IMDb (availability varies by marketplace).

Enjoy Prime Video updates on your Apple TV or Mac by downloading the latest app from the App Store on your device. This requires an Apple TV 3rd generation or later, and for Mac, macOS Big Sur 11.4 or later.

If you subscribe to Prime Video via iTunes (where available), payment is charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase and your membership automatically renews monthly unless auto-renewal is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the then current plan period. Your account is charged for renewal within 24 hours before the end of each plan period at the rate of your selected plan. Manage your subscription and turn off auto-renewal anytime by going to My Account or through iTunes.

For customers located within the European Union, United Kingdom or Brazil: By using this app, you agree to the Amazon Conditions of Use and the Prime Video Terms of Use at primevideo.com/ww-av-legal-home. See our Privacy Notice, Cookies Notice and Interest-Based Ads Notice at primevideo.com/ww-av-legal-home.

For all other customers: By using this app, you agree to the Amazon Conditions of Use, Privacy Notice, and and the Prime Video Terms of Use at primevideo.com/ww-av-legal-home.

【@TV互动电视5.5.5 强势来袭！ 】
装文青、装淑女，该装就装！神奇V5新版本，该下就下！
短视频专区: 个性定制短视频功能全新上线, 制作独特风格的视频MV, 更有全新美颜、萌脸贴纸、音乐和字幕等精彩功能, 您可以随时随地用短视频记录生活中的精彩瞬间并分享给好友, 丰富您的精彩生活。
直播专区:"中国网红"携各路主播炫酷来袭，更有一键开播、魔法美颜、与主播零距离互动让你欢乐不停！
互动专区：开启全新时代，中国币赚不停，商城好礼享不停！根本停不下来！小伙伴们都惊呆了！
虚拟互动：动手指、砸鸡蛋、抛鲜花，主持人与你玩转虚拟互动。
卫视互动：问答、竞猜、彩票 三种模式无缝衔接。题答不完，中国币赚不完！
点播互动：看广告，赢中国币？你没听错！赚钱就是这么简单！还有更加引人入胜的趣味切西瓜模式，还不来试试！
Liveshow：主打各类演唱会、歌友会，让你360度无死角全方位了解你最喜爱的明星，歌迷的绝对福利！更有雷子乐小剧场等你了解欢乐的世界！
靠谱青年：千万青年人的靠谱阵地，全面解析由草根到达人的魅力成长史！

【关于我们】
@TV互动电视是专为手机量身打造的一款集休闲、娱乐、互动、直播为一体的视频播放软件、指尖互动的在线视频库，由中投视讯文化传媒有限公司（CNLive.com）集成并研发的国家新媒体平台，为用户提供新闻、娱乐、音乐、影视、动漫等海量直播和点播的内容，更有神秘互动体验邀您来尝鲜。真正的互动体验，您值得期待！

Looking for something to watch during your daily commute, lunch break, or just to unwind after a long day? Look no further than our Dramabox!
With our app, you can access a huge selection of high-quality content from some of the best creators out there. From indie films to award-winning TV series, we've got something for everyone. And with new content added regularly, you'll always have something fresh to watch.

Here are just a few of the features you'll love about our app:

- Stream your favorite shows and movies in HD quality, no matter where you are.
- Discover new content based on your viewing preferences and what's trending in the app.
- Get personalized recommendations based on your viewing history and ratings.
- Enjoy ad-free streaming and uninterrupted viewing.
- Create playlists and save your favorite titles for later.

So what are you waiting for? Download our app now and start watching the best short movies, TV series, and drama today!

Discover videos from around the world and create your own with easy-to-use tools to capture your life. 

From your morning coffee to your evening commute, TikTok has the videos to make your day. Whether you’re a sports fanatic, a travel lover or simply looking for a laugh, there’s something for everyone on TikTok. Enjoy an endless stream of short videos on things you love most. Watch what you like, skip what you don’t. 
 
WATCH
A personalised video feed based on what you watch, like, and share. TikTok offers you real, interesting, and fun videos that will make your day.  You'll find a variety of videos from Food and Fashion to Sports and DIY - and everything in between.

 
CREATE
Pause and resume your video with just a tap. As many times as you need.
Millions of creators on TikTok showcase their incredible skills and every day life. Let yourself be inspired.
 
ENTERTAIN
Be entertained and inspired by a global community of creators.

Take video creation to the next level with special effects, filters, music, and more. Unlock filters, effects, and AR objects to take your videos to the next level.
 
CUSTOMISE
Our integrated editing tools allow you to easily edit your videos.
Trim, cut, merge and duplicate video clips without leaving the app.
 
ADD MUSIC
Add your favorite sound to your videos with millions of music clips and sounds. 
We curate music and sound playlists for you with the hottest tracks in every genre, including Hip Hop, EM, Pop, Rock, Rap, and Country, and the most viral original sounds.

Obtain access to LIVE benefits to better interact with hosts!
Choose between a one-month subscription or auto-renewal subscription to enjoy special LIVE benefits (currently only available in limited regions)

Introducing DramaShorts, the cutting-edge HD streaming platform revolutionizing how you enjoy video content!

Say goodbye to the same old movies and TV shows! With DramaShorts, you’re in control. Choose your favorites and pay as little as a dime per episode for our top hits! Plus, the first few episodes are always free, ensuring you only watch what you truly love.

DramaShorts isn’t just another streaming service—it’s a game-changer for TV shows. Our episodes are bite-sized at just 1-minute long, perfect for watching on the go. Whether you’re lounging on the couch, grabbing a quick lunch, or even taking a bathroom break, DramaShorts is there for you.

With DramaShorts, the entertainment possibilities are endless. From gripping dramas to heartwarming romances, spine-tingling suspense to thrilling mysteries, we’ve got it all.

Here’s what awaits you:
- Binge-worthy original shows packed with drama and satisfaction
- Unlimited access to our exclusive content library
- A state-of-the-art recommendation system for effortless discovery
- Thousands of hours of entertainment, available anytime, anywhere
- Seamless streaming on any mobile device

Experience the next generation of bite-sized entertainment with DramaShorts. What are you waiting for? Download now and start your journey into a world of captivating stories!

Tired of never finishing a movie or paying for unused subscriptions? 

Watch ReelShort — Every Second is Drama

Say hello to ReelShort, a next-gen HD streaming short movie platform offering exclusive vertical TV mini series. Recognized by Times100 for our movie reels innovation in the entertainment industry, we're changing the way you watch movies with our one-minute short movie episodes that you can enjoy anytime, anywhere, all from the convenience of your phone with the ReelShort App.

Choose from our TV mini series library packed with endless addictive movie shorts added daily, from romantic encounters with billionaires and heart-wrenching tragedies to epic comeback stories and more—you won't ever be short on short movie entertainment!

Featured Shows:
[Don't Miss Me When I'm Gone] After losing my parents, I move in with my godmother, Aunt Sandra. I live under her roof with her two sons-the Miller brothers-surrounded by love and care. I think I’ll end up with one of them. But everything changes when the maid’s daughter, Lola, moves in. The Miller brother I love most breaks my heart into pieces. After I leave, they lose their minds trying to find me.

[Move Aside! I'm the Final Boss] Kingsley is the secret King of King's Corps and the richest man on Earth, but when he returns from the battlefield, his childhood sweetheart brutally dumps him, thinking he's a clown. How will the King of all men make her regret it?

Here's why you'll love ReelShort:

Bite-sized original movie shorts designed for on-the-go viewing
•Exclusive short movies with juicy vertical content that will keep you hooked
•New TV mini series added daily, with hundreds of new episodes each month
•Hollywood-quality entertainment, crafted for the big screen delivered to your small screen
•The first ever interactive live action short movies, where you decide what happens next
Experience the future of short movie entertainment, one minute at a time — download ReelShort now!

"Crazy Maple Studio is quietly changing the streaming game with its ReelShort app." - Time100 

"The biggest player in this new genre is ReelShort." - New York Times

"Every minute has a hook that keeps you watching." - Wall Street Journal

"ReelShort, which has dozens of shows — similarly light on character development and packed with curveballs — made for binge-watching in minutes." - Washington Post

If you subscribe through Apple, the payment will be deducted from your App Store account upon purchase confirmation.
Subscription privileges: While your subscription is active, you can watch all tv mini series for free.
Your subscription will take effect within 24 hours after purchase, depending on the status of your order in the Apple Store. The subscription is valid for 7 days.
Auto-Renewal: Your subscription will automatically renew. You will be charged within 24 hours before the start of each subscription period until you cancel your subscription.
Cancellation: On iOS devices, you can cancel your subscription at least 24 hours before the next renewal date by going to Settings > iTunes & App Store > Apple ID > View Apple ID > Subscriptions > ReelShort.
The subscription is billed weekly. The actual price may vary by region.

Looking for the most talked about TV programmes and films from the around the world? They’re all on Netflix.

We’ve got award-winning series, films, documentaries and stand-up specials. And with the mobile app, you get Netflix while you travel, commute or just take a break.

What you’ll love about Netflix:
• We add TV programmes and films all the time. Browse new titles or search for your favourites, and stream videos straight to your device.
• The more you watch, the better Netflix gets at recommending TV programmes and films you’ll love.
• Enjoy a safe watching experience just for children with family-friendly entertainment.
• Preview quick videos of our series and films and get notifications for new episodes and releases.

Netflix membership is a month-to-month subscription that begins at sign-up. You can easily cancel at any time, online, 24 hours a day. There are no long-term contracts or cancellation fees. We just want you to love what you watch.

Please note that the App Privacy information applies to information collected through the Netflix iOS, iPadOS and tvOS apps. See the Netflix Privacy Statement (link below) to learn more about information we collect in other contexts, including account registration.

Welcome to NetShort, a next-generation HD streaming platform where we offer exclusive vertical TV programming. Our goal is to change how you watch movies, allowing you to enjoy mini-series up to one minute long anytime, anywhere. Whether you're at home or on the go, NetShort lets you watch the most popular mini-series, providing an immersive viewing experience. Join us today!

Here's what awaits you:

"Exclusive Personal Theater"
Easily explore popular genres like romance, fantasy, martial arts, and time travel. All exciting mini-series are authorized. New episodes are added daily and weekly, keeping you immersed in imaginative worlds.

"Customize Your Experience"
Let NetShort's customizable features bring you a personalized viewing experience. Adjust video playback settings as you like, explore various genres, and plan your watchlist. In this vast realm of outstanding short videos, create a personalized journey tailored to your preferences. Your entertainment, your customization!

"Exclusive Originals"
Explore a world of content you won't find elsewhere. At NetShort, we're excited to present a series of exclusive original short videos. We promise fresh perspectives, unique narratives, and unparalleled creativity. Immerse yourself in diverse and captivating stories, each showcasing the art of concise and powerful storytelling.

"Frequent Updates"
Experience the joy of discovering new content through NetShort's regular updates! Our library continues to expand, ensuring each visit to the app brings fresh and engaging episodes. Say goodbye to mundane routines and embrace an endless stream of entertainment trends!

What are you waiting for? NetShort: Popular Short Dramas & TV is free to use, offering exclusive benefits for those seeking a more immersive experience.

Download now and dive deep into the world of entertainment!


Notice:
If you subscribe through Apple, the payment will be deducted from your App Store account upon purchase confirmation.
Your subscription will take effect within 24 hours after purchase, depending on the status of your order in the Apple Store. 
Within 24 hours before the current subscription period ends, the system will charge the renewal fee from your account based on the selected plan. After the renewal payment is processed, your subscription period will be automatically extended.
You can cancel your subscription by going to Settings > iTunes & App Store > Apple ID > View Apple ID > Subscriptions > Netshort. If you do not unsubscribe at least 24 hours before the current subscription ends, this subscription will be automatically renewed.

With the free Steam Mobile App, you can take Steam with you anywhere. Buy PC games and get the latest game and community news - while protecting your Steam account.

Shop Steam
Browse the Steam catalog of PC games from your phone. Never miss a sale again.

Steam Guard
Protect your Steam account and make sign in faster with two-factor authentication.
• Two-factor authentication to ensure you’re the only one with access to your account
• QR code sign in - Scan a QR code to sign into Steam instead of entering a password or…
• Sign in confirmation - Confirm your regular Steam sign ins with simple “approve” or “deny”

Library & Remote downloads
The new Library view makes it easy to view game content, discussions, guides, support, and more. Plus you can manage game downloads and updates to your PC from your phone.

Trade and Market Confirmations
Speed up item trades and sales by using your phone to confirm them.

Plus
• A personalized News feed based on your Library with the latest news, events, and content updates direct from publishers and game developers.
• Customizable Steam notifications: wishlist, sales, comments, trades, discussions, friend requests, and more.
• Access to the entire Steam Community - discussions, groups, guides, Market, Workshop, broadcasts, and more.
• Access to your friends, friend activity, groups, screenshots, inventory, wallet, and more.
• Authorized Devices - Manage access to the devices your account has signed in
• An improved Store browsing experience for mobile screens
• Support for using multiple Steam accounts in the app
• Support for customizing your app's main tabs

Discover the latest showtimes, new releases, and movie tickets with Regal. Skip the box office lines at your favorite theater with Regal. Visiting your cinema is easier than ever with digital movie tickets for the latest films in the palm of your hand. View film ratings and watch the newest movies all with the help of the Regal mobile app.
 
Movie night is better than ever when you use Regal. Discover new releases, find movie times, buy mobile tickets ahead of time, and visit your nearest Regal cinema for a seamless moviegoing experience. Make the most of your next movie night with the cinema app that works for you!
 
Collect credits with every movie ticket purchase once you join the Regal Crown Club for free! Enjoy movie rewards, movie deals, and enjoy a cinema experience like no other as a Regal member. The Regal mobile app was made to enhance your moviegoing adventures.
 
Want even more movie theater perks? Upgrade to a Regal Unlimited movie subscription pass and get all the benefits of Regal Crown Club and more! Watch as many movies as you want, as many times as you want, whenever you want, wherever you want. From movie coupons, exclusive rewards, and deals on concessions, Regal Unlimited is your portal to a whole new way to visit the theater.
 
Buy tickets, visit theaters, and earn rewards with Regal – your portal to the best movie theater experience. Take your movie night to new heights and download today.
 
GET SHOWTIMES AND BUY MOVIE TICKETS INSTANTLY
• From new releases to current movies – purchase tickets seamlessly with Regal
• Get last minute movie tickets at a theater near you
• Buy tickets for films coming soon and visit as soon as they release
• Your mobile movie ticket lets you skip the line and jump straight into the action
 
FIND MOVIE THEATERS NEAR YOU
• Visit your favorite movie theaters and watch new releases
• Search for cinemas in other locations easily
• Find movie times at a specific theater to plan your movie night
• Cinema directions available in-app to make your next visit seamless
  
SIGN UP FOR REGAL CROWN CLUB & REGAL UNLIMITED
• Buy tickets, visit movie theaters, watch movies, and earn rewards
• Collect movie coupons and rewards for every dollar spent on movie tickets and concessions
• Visit cinemas using your Regal physical card or virtual one stored in-app for quick access
• Check your Regal Crown Club balance right in the Regal mobile app
 
Prepare for your next movie night with the ultimate film companion. Find showtimes, buy movie tickets, earn exclusive rewards, and watch the latest films – all with Regal.
 
By downloading, installing and using this App, you agree to Regal Cinemas Mobile Application Privacy Policy and Terms of Use

Experience the thrill of unique and original short dramas and films, each crafted to last around a minute, ideal for entertainment while on the move. Perfect for moments during your commute, relaxing at home, or while enjoying a meal out, My Drama offers a quick escape into quality storytelling.

Expansive, High-Definition Collection: Immerse yourself in our broad selection of short dramas and films, inspired by novels and presented in crystal-clear high definition. With regular updates, our collection promises a fresh and visually stunning experience every visit.

Diverse and Captivating Content: Delve into a world of stories ranging from modern urban romances to legendary narratives involving magical doctors, influential CEOs, billionaires, royalty, and gods of war. Our collection is designed to spark the interest of all types of viewers.

Personalized Suggestions: Benefit from our sophisticated recommendation system, which presents a lineup of the finest original shorts and novel-based film adaptations, tailored to the varied preferences of drama and film enthusiasts.

User-Friendly Interface: Our sleek and intuitive design ensures a seamless and aesthetically pleasing browsing experience, making it easy to find and enjoy your next favorite short.

Flexible Viewing Options: Enjoy our content on any mobile device or enhance your viewing by casting directly to your smart TV for an enveloping experience.

Exclusive Access: Gain entry to our unique and original shows, available only here.

SUPPORT & POLICIES

Bluu is the Caribbean’s home for premium streaming—live sports, local TV, and curated movies & shows in one app. Stream like ah boss across mobile, web, and TV devices.



Sports you get:

All RUSH Channels

Football: UEFA Champions League & UEFA Europa League; LaLiga; Bundesliga — and much more being added

Why Bluu



One simple package: premium sports + local TV + hand‑picked movies/shows



Built for the Caribbean: regional catalog and data‑friendly streaming



Watch anywhere: phone, tablet, Fire TV Stick, Apple TV, and cast to your TV (AirPlay/Chromecast)



Availability & account


Bluu is available in supported Caribbean markets. Contact your local sales office for more info. A Flow ID is required to sign in.



Billing 


After any free preview or promo, your subscription renews automatically on your usual Flow bill.




Legal

Tired of scrolling for 20 minutes to find a show you can finish in your commute – without paying a cent? Seer Drama solves that. Our app packs 100% free bite-sized short dramas (10-15 mins/episode) into your busy day – perfect for lunch breaks, waiting in line, or unwinding after work. No long commitments, no hidden fees, just instant free entertainment.

Features You'll Love:
● Endless Free Content, Curated for You: Stream an ever-growing library of mini series, short films, and stories – from heartwarming romance to edge-of-your-seat thrills. New dramas drop daily, so you’ll never hit “nothing to watch” – and it’s all free.  
● Watch Anywhere, Anytime – No Cost: HD streaming works on cellular or Wi-Fi. Download episodes for free to watch offline (no data worries!) – pause and resume across your iPhone, iPad, or Mac (M1+). 
● Smart Recommendations, 100% Free: We learn your tastes (e.g., “you love cozy romance!”) and suggest new picks – no more endless scrolling, no paywalls to unlock recommendations.  
● Free to Enjoy, Minimal Ads: Access hundreds of dramas completely free. Ads help us keep the content flowing – no forced ads, just occasional, brief breaks to support our free library.  
● Talk to the Story: Dive deeper by chatting directly with characters and exploring alternate storylines. Experience the real story like never before.

Ready to turn 10 minutes into a great, free break? Download Seer Drama now – your next favorite short drama is waiting, and it won’t cost you a thing.  

Note: Seer Drama is 100% free to download and use. We collect basic usage data (e.g., viewing history) to improve recommendations – If you encounter any problems or have other suggestions, please contact ai1zutest@gmail.com. Your every feedback is very important to us.

The best memes from 2016 till 2025.
* Over 1300 sounds! 700+ videos!
* New sounds are published almost every day.
    Stay tuned with push notifications.
* Search bar will help you find any sound.
* Share sounds and videos with friends.
* Links for the original memes.
* Create your custom sections! Add, move, and organize sounds easily with your created sections.
* Sound effects can be changed in real-time:
   • Speed of the playback
   • Pitch effect
   • Distortion
   • Reverb
* Enable reverse to play sounds in reverse.
* Playback modes:
   • "Simple" (first tap to play, the second tap to stop the sound)
   • "Normal" (every tap restarts the playback of the sound)
   • "Multiple" (play one sound several times simultaneously)
   • "Repeat" (sounds are infinitely repeated)
* Sorting sounds modes:
  • "Custom" (Sort sounds as you want by long-pressing and dragging the sound)
  • "A-Z", "Z-A"
  • "Most Played" (your most played sounds)
  • "Most Popular" (most played sounds from all users)
  • "Recently added"
* Long-press and drag any sounds on the board in the "Custom" sort option.
* Shake your device or tap on the 'Random sound' button to play a random sound.
* Record or import your own sounds and videos.
* iCloud backup for your imported sounds.
* Suggestions for memes addition to the 'Community' section.
* Censored mode for all the cursing words in memes.
* Stop all sounds by tapping the "Stop all" button.

Try the most advanced Meme Soundboard on the App Store!

Riot Mobile is the official companion app for Riot Games, personalized to keep you connected to the players, content and events you care about most.  

Made to support League of Legends, VALORANT, Wild Rift, Teamfight Tactics and Legends of Runeterra, the companion app is your one-stop-shop to discover new experiences, learn about major updates and organize play across all of Riot’s titles.

ORGANIZE PLAY
We’ve made it easier than ever to connect and organize play with other players.  Riot Mobile allows you to chat across all of our game titles and supported regions in one central location so you can get into game faster without all the hassle.

DISCOVER NEW EXPERIENCES
Did you hear about the new comic, the animated series, the virtual PENTAKILL concert or that poro-themed silent disco party in your city?  Tell us what you care about and we’ll make sure you never miss an important beat again.

MULTI-GAME NEWS
Get all the patch notes, game updates, champ announcements, etc you need across all of our titles in one central place while on-the-go.

ESPORTS ON-THE-GO
Want to know the schedule or line-up for your favorite esports league?  Want to check out the VOD you missed? Want to completely avoid spoilers?  You can with Riot Mobile. 

EARN REWARDS
Get rewards and make progress toward mission goals for completing qualifying activities within the app, like watching a VOD or stream at your own convenience. 

MONITOR STATS WITH MATCH HISTORY
Track your own progression and compare your in-game and out-of-game stats with your friends so you can climb the ranks and become legendary.

Support: riotmobilesupport@riotgames.com 
Feedback: riotmobilesupport@riotgames.com

Platinumlist is built with you in mind.
